verses.verse: I solemnly <S%G1263><s%> charge <S%G1263><s%> [you] in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who is to judge <S%G2919><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> and the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and by His appearing <S%G2015><s%> and His kingdom: <S%G932><s%>

preach <S%G2784><s%> the word; <S%G3056><s%> be ready <S%G2186><s%> in season <S%G2122><s%> [and] out of season; <S%G171><s%> reprove, <S%G1651><s%> rebuke, <S%G2008><s%> exhort, <S%G3870><s%> with great <S%G3956><s%> patience <S%G3115><s%> and instruction. <S%G1322><s%>

For the time <S%G2540><s%> will come <S%G1510><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they will not endure <S%G430><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine; <S%G1319><s%> but [wanting] to have their ears <S%G189><s%> tickled, <S%G2833><s%> they will accumulate <S%G2002><s%> for themselves <S%G1438><s%> teachers <S%G1320><s%> in accordance <S%G2596><s%> to their own <S%G2398><s%> desires; <S%G1939><s%>
and will turn <S%G654><s%> away <S%G654><s%> their ears <S%G189><s%> from the truth, <S%G225><s%> and will turn <S%G1624><s%> aside <S%G1624><s%> to myths. <S%G3454><s%>

But you, be sober <S%G3525><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> endure <S%G2553><s%> hardship, <S%G2553><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of an evangelist, <S%G2099><s%> fulfill <S%G4135><s%> your ministry. <S%G1248><s%>
For I am already <S%G2235><s%> being poured <S%G4689><s%> out as a drink <S%G4689><s%> offering, <S%G4689><s%> and the time <S%G2540><s%> of my departure <S%G359><s%> has come. <S%G2186><s%>
I have fought <S%G75><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> fight, <S%G73><s%> I have finished <S%G5055><s%> the course, <S%G1408><s%> I have kept <S%G5083><s%> the faith; <S%G4102><s%>

in the future <S%G3062><s%> there is laid <S%G606><s%> up for me the crown <S%G4735><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> Judge, <S%G2923><s%> will award <S%G591><s%> to me on that day; <S%G2250><s%> and not only <S%G3440><s%> to me, but also <S%G2532><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> who have loved <S%G25><s%> His appearing. <S%G2015><s%>
Make <S%G4704><s%> every <S%G4704><s%> effort <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to me soon; <S%G5030><s%>

for Demas, <S%G1214><s%> having loved <S%G25><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G3568><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> has deserted <S%G1459><s%> me and gone <S%G4198><s%> to Thessalonica; <S%G2332><s%> Crescens <S%G2913><s%> [has gone] to Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> to Dalmatia. <S%G1149><s%>
Only <S%G3441><s%> Luke <S%G3065><s%> is with me. Pick <S%G353><s%> up Mark <S%G3138><s%> and bring <S%G71><s%> him with you, for he is useful <S%G2173><s%> to me for service. <S%G1248><s%>
But Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> I have sent <S%G649><s%> to Ephesus. <S%G2181><s%>

When you come <S%G2064><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> the cloak <S%G5315><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I left <S%G620><s%> at Troas <S%G5174><s%> with Carpus, <S%G2591><s%> and the books, <S%G975><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> the parchments. <S%G3200><s%>

Alexander <S%G223><s%> the coppersmith <S%G5471><s%> did <S%G1731><s%> me much <S%G4183><s%> harm; <S%G2556><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> will repay <S%G591><s%> him according <S%G2596><s%> to his deeds. <S%G2041><s%>
Be on guard <S%G5442><s%> against him yourself, <S%G4771><s%> for he vigorously <S%G3029><s%> opposed <S%G436><s%> our teaching. <S%G3056><s%>

At my first <S%G4413><s%> defense <S%G627><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> supported <S%G3854><s%> me, but all <S%G3956><s%> deserted <S%G1459><s%> me; may it not be counted <S%G3049><s%> against them.

But the Lord <S%G2962><s%> stood <S%G3936><s%> with me, and strengthened <S%G1743><s%> me, in order <S%G2443><s%> that through <S%G1223><s%> me the proclamation <S%G2782><s%> might be fully <S%G4135><s%> accomplished, <S%G4135><s%> and that all <S%G3956><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> might hear; <S%G191><s%> and I was delivered <S%G4506><s%> out of the lion's mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

The Lord <S%G2962><s%> will deliver <S%G4506><s%> me from every <S%G3956><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> deed, <S%G2041><s%> and will bring <S%G4982><s%> me safely <S%G4982><s%> to His heavenly <S%G2032><s%> kingdom; <S%G932><s%> to Him [be] the glory <S%G1391><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Prisca <S%G4251><s%> and Aquila, <S%G207><s%> and the household <S%G3624><s%> of Onesiphorus. <S%G3683><s%>
Erastus <S%G2037><s%> remained <S%G3306><s%> at Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> but Trophimus <S%G5161><s%> I left <S%G620><s%> sick <S%G770><s%> at Miletus. <S%G3399><s%>

Make <S%G4704><s%> every <S%G4704><s%> effort <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> winter. <S%G5494><s%> Eubulus <S%G2103><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you, also <S%G2532><s%> Pudens <S%G4227><s%> and Linus <S%G3044><s%> and Claudia <S%G2803><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the brethren. <S%G80><s%>
The Lord <S%G2962><s%> be with your spirit. <S%G4151><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with you.
